item.title: Include environment-specific settings files on Pantheon

description.p: I was recently doing some work on a site hosted on Pantheon and came across an issue, for which part of the suggested fix was to ensure that the $base_url variable was explicitly defined within settings.php (this is also best practice on all Drupal sites).
